name: Ditto Network
description: Ditto Network is a composable execution layer designed to run event-driven automations. By leveraging shared security, Ditto ensures trustless, reliable execution of workflows across EVM-compatible chains. Developers can use Ditto to automate complex processes, such as liquidation protection, cross-chain asset swaps, and yield farming strategies, unlocking new possibilities for decentralized applications and AI-driven agents.
